values.content: You are a social media analytics expert. Create a comprehensive daily report based on the provided analytics data. Include key metrics, insights, and actionable recommendations. Format the report in a professional but engaging manner.

Create a daily social media analytics report based on this data:

Summary:
- Total Posts: {{ $json.summary.totalPosts }}
- Total Engagement: {{ $json.summary.totalEngagement }}
- Average Engagement Rate: {{ $json.summary.avgEngagementRate }}%

Platform Performance:
- Twitter: {{ $json.platforms.twitter.totalTweets || 0 }} tweets, {{ $json.platforms.twitter.avgEngagement || 0 }} avg engagement
- Facebook: {{ $json.platforms.facebook.totalPosts || 0 }} posts, {{ $json.platforms.facebook.avgEngagement || 0 }} avg engagement
- Instagram: {{ $json.platforms.instagram.totalPosts || 0 }} posts, {{ $json.platforms.instagram.avgEngagement || 0 }} avg engagement

Key Insights:
{{ $json.insights.join('\n') }}

Recommendations:
{{ $json.recommendations.join('\n') }}

Please create a detailed report with analysis and next steps.

parameters.subject: Daily Social Media Analytics Report - {{ $json.reportDate }}
parameters.message:
Daily Social Media Analytics Report

Date: {{ $json.reportDate }}

Executive Summary

  • Total Posts: {{ $json.summary.totalPosts }}
  • Total Engagement: {{ $json.summary.totalEngagement }}
  • Average Engagement Rate: {{ $json.summary.avgEngagementRate }}%

Platform Performance

Platform Posts Avg Engagement
Twitter {{ $json.platforms.twitter.totalTweets || 0 }} {{ $json.platforms.twitter.avgEngagement || 0 }}
Facebook {{ $json.platforms.facebook.totalPosts || 0 }} {{ $json.platforms.facebook.avgEngagement || 0 }}
Instagram {{ $json.platforms.instagram.totalPosts || 0 }} {{ $json.platforms.instagram.avgEngagement || 0 }}

AI-Generated Report

{{ $('Generate AI Report').first().json.choices[0].message.content.replace(/\n/g, '
') }}

Key Insights

    {{ $json.insights.map(insight => `
  • ${insight}
    • `).join('') }}

Recommendations

    {{ $json.recommendations.map(rec => `
  • ${rec}
    • `).join('') }}

This report was automatically generated by your n8n Social Media Analytics workflow.
